game_russian_tutor_start_text:
Hello! I am your personal AI tutor for the Russian language.

You can ask me any questions about grammar, ask me to check your text, or just chat for practice.

Type your first message to begin. To end the lesson, send the /menu command.
game_russian_tutor_resume_text: Let's continue our Russian lesson! I'm ready for your questions.
game_russian_tutor_callback_text: This game is controlled by text messages.
game_russian_tutor_end_text:
Lesson finished! I hope you've learned something new. Come back whenever you want to practice more!

To choose another game, use the /menu command.
game_speech_practice_resume_text: Ok, let's continue your speech practice!
